content: this crochet pattern is very easy to follow and creates the most beautiful and easy hair bow slide with a lovely feminine vibe it s super beginner friendly and can be made up in the space of just over an hour for this project you will need 1 skein of lion brand coboo yarn in shade pink 4 mm crochet hook tapestry needle pair of scissors a 5 cm or larger hair slide darning needle and thread the full length video tutorial is linked in the pattern this pattern is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this is a great project for beginners pattern will be available for instant download upon payment happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
